title: The new draft pick and choosing your role.
body:
First off I wanna say, it looks pretty cool. I haven't seen it in person (because I don't have a PBE account) but I've seen videos/commentaries on them an it looks nice, not saying I like it but I haven't tried it so I wouldn't know. 

Anyway, I have a question/suggestion with the choosing a role part of the queue. Alright right now I have seen 6 options, top, jungle, mid, bot(adc), support and fill. 
So what I am suggesting is adding a feature where you can choose 'fill - but not for ____ ', for example, you can play all roles exceptionally well but cannot play a certain one if your life depended on it, for this example I will use jungle, you can play all roles but jungle, do you think there should be an option of 'fill but jungle'? 
Moreover what if you don't main a role, or main only one but don't mind playing other roles, for example, someone mains mid  but doesn't mind playing another role if it's not top. Should there be an option to fill but exclude the role of top?

Tl;Dr : Should there be a 'Fill' option where you can exclude a certain role.

Well before you comment I would like to add that the splendid people at Riot Games, may or may not have come up with this idea or have come across this issue already, and I strongly applaud you tell me if they have in a civil manner.

So any thoughts?

replies.body: If you're playing ranked and can't play every role, you shouldn't be playing ranked and are probably being carried. Same as "no ap runes" or "no jg champs on this acc".

Being able to play 4 roles much better than the 5th is not the same as having no champs or runes, and in fact is much more versatile than most people (who are much better at 1-2 than the rest). Who would you rather have on your team, someone whos good at one or two roles and mediocre-bad at the rest (which is the majority of people in ranked), or someone whos good at 4 roles and mediocre-bad at the other?
wrong. Got to d5 on 2 accs, playing strictly adc. I play jungle at a silver-gold level top at a high plat level and mid at a bronzodia level. AMA

And you're probably one of those ass hats that ctrl+v race "adc or troll" in champ select.

I REALLY dislike that the game has turned into a ctrl+v race.

Everyone should be prepared to fill any role required. I've been placed in teams with the other 4 people saying 'mid only'
Yeah i do fill, ashe supp, ashe top, ashe mid, ashe jg. :)
I can play ADC. And for the love of god I tried to practice but I cannot for the death of me play it well enough in a Ranked situation. Guess I should just stop playing Ranked huh?
Well you only have 300 normal wins. There's plenty of room for practise in there
:) who uses runes anyway. Full AS runes OP
Or how about you just accept that Riot is giving you the option to pick more than one role. If you don't want to fill, don't. It's really that simple.

Honestly this is just a suggestion, for me I don't really mind what happens I can adapt to changes and at least be able to play every role. 
I'm all for picking two roles I'd want to play, it was a random issue I thought about when looking at the preseason patch videos.
